data_table.description: Annual Follow-up Form. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: AFUcomp2_A
variable.description: [Vital status]. Final vital status [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]
variable.value: Contacted and alive ( Participant contacted, agreed to be interviewed)
Reported deceased [(Proxy/Informant contacted OR Other person contacted) AND (V1 Q2=Y)]
Contacted and refused (Contacted, refused to be interviewed)
Reported alive [(Proxy/Informant contacted OR Other person contacted) AND (V1 Q2=N)]

variable.name: AFUcomp3_A
variable.description: [Vital status]. Information obtained from: Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form [AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp6_A
variable.description: [General health]. Compare to other people your age, would you say that your health has been excellent, good, fair or poor? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp7_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Have you had any pain or discomfort in your chest? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp8_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Do you get it when you walk uphill or hurry? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp9_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Do you get it when you walk at an ordinary place on the level? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp10_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. What do you do if you get it if while you are working? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp11_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. If you stand still what happened to it? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp12_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. How soon? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp13a_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you tell me where it was? Sternum (upper or middle) [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp13b_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you tell me where it was? Sternum (lower) [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp13c_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you tell me where it was? Left anterior chest [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp13d_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you tell me where it was? Other [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp13e_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you tell me where it was? Left arm [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp13f_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Will you tell me where it was? Specify. [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp14_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Do you feel it anywhere else? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp15_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. Did you see a doctor because of this pain or discomfort? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp16_A
variable.description: [Chest pain on effort]. What did he say it was? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp17_A
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. Since our last contact have you had a severe pain across the front of your chest lasting for half an hour or more? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp18_A
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. Did you see a doctor because of this pain? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp19_A
variable.description: [Possible infraction]. What did you say it was? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp20_A
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. since our last contact on, have you had pain in either leg on walking? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp21_A
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Does this pain ever begin when you are standing still or sitting? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp22_A
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. In what part of your leg do you feel it? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp23_A
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Do you get it if you walk uphill or hurry? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp24_A
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Do you get it if you walk at an ordinary pace on the level? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp25_A
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. Does the pain ever disappear while you are walking? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp26_A
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. What do you do if you get it when you are walking? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp27_A
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. What happens to it if you stand still? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp28_A
variable.description: [Intermittent claudication]. What happens to it if you stand still? Relieved or not relieved. How soon? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp29_A
variable.description: [Stroke/TIA]. Since our last contact have you been told by a physician that you had a stroke, slight stroke, transient ischemic attack or TIA? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp30_A
variable.description: [Stroke/TIA Hospitalization]. Where you hospitalized for a heart attack since our last contact? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp31_A
variable.description: [Stroke/TIA Hospitalization]. Have you stayed overnight as a patient in a hospital for any other reason since our last contact? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUA]

variable.name: AFUcomp32_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Are you able to do heavy work around the house, like shoveling snow or washing windows, walls or floors, without help? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp33_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Are you able to walk up and down stairs to the second floor without help? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp34_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Are you able to walk half a mile without help? That's about 8 ordinary blocks. [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp35a_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Are you able to go to work? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp35b_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Is a heart problem the main cause of your not being able to work? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp36a_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. During the past 4 weeks, have you missed work for at least half a day because of your health? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp37a_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Are you able to do your usual activities, such as work around the house or recreation? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp37b_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Is a heart problem the main cause of your being unable to do this activity? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp38a_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. During the past 4 weeks, have you had to cut down on your usual activities (such as work around the house or recreation), for half a day or more because of your health? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp39a_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Over the past year, have you lost more than 10 pounds? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp39c_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Where you trying to lose this weight? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp40a_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Please tell me which of the following describes your current marital status. [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp40b_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. When did you become (widowed, divorced/separated)? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]
variable.value: More than 1 month ago, but during the last 6 months
More than 6 months ago, but during the last year

variable.name: AFUcomp40c_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. Did someone [else] you were close to die in the past year? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp40d_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. When did this person die? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]
variable.value: More than 1 month ago, but during the last 6 months
More than 6 months ago, but during the last year

variable.name: AFUcomp40e_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. What was this person's relationship to you? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp36b_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. On how many days has this happened? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp38b_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. On how many days has this happened? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp39b_D
variable.description: [Functional status]. About how much lower is your weight how than a year ago? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUD]

variable.name: AFUcomp7a_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Heart attack [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7b_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Heart failure or congestive heart failure [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7c_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? High blood pressure [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7d_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Diabetes [sugar in the blood] [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7e_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Blood clot in a leg [deep vein thrombosis] [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7f_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Blood clot in a lungs [pulmonary embolus] [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7g_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Chronic lung disease, such as bronchitis or emphysema [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7h_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Asthma [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7i_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Cancer [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7j_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Can you tell me in what part of the body the cancer was located? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7l_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Have you had another cancer? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp7m_G
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had any of the following? Can you tell me in what part of the body the cancer was located? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp11a_G
variable.description: [Overnight admissions]. Since our last contact, have you stayed overnight as a patient in a nursing home? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp11b_G
variable.description: [Overnight admissions]. Are you currently staying in a nursing home? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp12a_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since we last contacted you on (mm/dd/yyyy) have you had surgery on your heart, or the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for varicose veins? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp12b_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since we last ARIC visit on (mm/dd/yyyy) have you had surgery on your heart, or the arteries of your neck or legs, excluding surgery for varicose veins? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp13a_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have coronary bypass [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp13b_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Other heart procedure [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp13c_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Carotid endarterectomy [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp13d_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Site [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp13e_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Other arterial revascularization [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp13f_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Any other type of surgery on your heart or the arteries of your neck or legs? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp14a_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since we last contacted you on (mm/dd/yyyy) have you had a balloon angioplasty on the arteries of your heart, neck, or legs? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp14b_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Since we last visit to the ARIC clinic on (mm/dd/yyyy) have you had a balloon angioplasty on the arteries of your heart, neck, or legs? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp15a_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have angioplasty of the coronary arteries [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp15b_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have angioplasty in the arteries of your neck [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp15c_G
variable.description: [Invasive procedures]. Did you have angioplasty of lower extremity arteries [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp16a_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Did you take any medications during the past two weeks for high blood pressure [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp16b_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Did you take any medications during the past two weeks for high blood cholesterol [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp16c_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Did you take any medications during the past two weeks for high blood sugar [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp17_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Are you NOW taking aspirin, or a medicine containing aspirin, on a regular basis? This does not include Tylenol nor Advil [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp18_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Is the participant male or female? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp19a_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Since we last contacted you on (mm/dd/yyyy), have you taken or used any female hormone pills, skin patches, shots or implants? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp19b_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Since your last visit on (mm/dd/yyyy), have you taken or used any female hormone pills, skin patches, shots or implants? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp19c_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Please give me the names of the female hormones you have used since our last contact (since that exam), starting with any you may be taking currently or with the most recent one. Please exclude hormone creams. Name [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp19d_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Please give me the names of the female hormones you have used since our last contact (since that exam), starting with any you may be taking currently or with the most recent one. Please exclude hormone creams. Name [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp20_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Please give me the names of the female hormones you have used since our last contact (since that exam), starting with any you may be taking currently or with the most recent one. Please exclude hormone creams. Code 1 [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp21_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you also used a second female hormone since we last contacted you? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp21a_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you used a second female hormone since we last contacted you? Name 2 [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp22_G
variable.description: [Interview]. Have you used a second female hormone since we last contacted you? Code 2 [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp30_G
variable.description: [Other items]. Do you now smoke cigarettes? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp32_G
variable.description: [Other items]. I would like to read seven categories that ask about whether you are employed, unemployed or retired. [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]
variable.value: Homemaking, not working outside the home
Employed at a job for pay, either full or part-time
Employed, but temporarily away from my regular work
Retired from my usual occupation and not working
Retired from my usual occupation, but working for pay

variable.name: AFUcomp34_G
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Does participant (still) live within official ARIC study boundaries? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp35_G
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Will your center (still) be able to get his/her records via community surveillance? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUG]

variable.name: AFUcomp36_H
variable.description: [Administrative information]. Result code [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUH]

variable.name: AFUcomp32a_H
variable.description: [Other items]. Please tell me which of the following best describes your employment status [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form]

variable.name: AFUcomp32b_H
variable.description: [Other items]. Which of these two categories best describes your "Employed" status [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUH]
variable.value: Employed at a job for pay, either full or part-time
Employed, but temporary away from my regular work

variable.name: AFUcomp32c_H
variable.description: [Other items]. Which of these two categories best describes your "Unemployed" status [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUH]

variable.name: AFUcomp32d_H
variable.description: [Other items]. Which of these two categories best describes your "Retired" status [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUH]

variable.name: AFUcomp8b_K
variable.description: [Stroke/TIA]. Were you hospitalized for this stroke, slight stroke, transient ischemic attack or TIA? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUK]

variable.name: AFUcomp7b_L
variable.description: [General health]. Has participant ever reported a heart failure diagnosis in AFU without a document HF hospitalization in the ARIC data base? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp8_L
variable.description: [General health]. In a previous ARIC phone call in [year], you indicated that you had been diagnosed with heart failure or congestive heart failure. Do you recall that you had such a diagnosis of heart failure? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp8d_L
variable.description: [General health]. In a previous ARIC phone call in [year], you indicated that you had been diagnosed with heart failure or congestive heart failure. Do you recall that you had such a diagnosis of heart failure? Was this within 3 yrs of today's date? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp8f_L
variable.description: [General health]. In a previous ARIC phone call in [year], you indicated that you had been diagnosed with heart failure or congestive heart failure. Do you recall that you had such a diagnosis of heart failure? Were you hospitalized for heart failure at that time? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp8g_L
variable.description: [General health]. In a previous ARIC phone call in [year], you indicated that you had been diagnosed with heart failure or congestive heart failure. Do you recall that you had such a diagnosis of heart failure? Were you hospitalized for heart failure or congestive heart failure at another time? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp9_L
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you on mm/dd/yyyy, has a doctor said that you had hear failure or congestive heart failure? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp9d_L
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you on mm/dd/yyyy, has a doctor said that you had hear failure or congestive heart failure? Was this within 3 yrs. of today's date [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp9e_L
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you on mm/dd/yyyy, has a doctor said that you had hear failure or congestive heart failure? Were you hospitalized for heart failure at that time? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp10_L
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said that your heart is weak. Or does not pump as strongly as it should, or that you had fluid on the lungs? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp10d_L
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said that your heart is weak. Or does not pump as strongly as it should, or that you had fluid on the lungs? Was this within 3 yrs. of today's date? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp10e_L
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said that your heart is weak. Or does not pump as strongly as it should, or that you had fluid on the lungs? Were you hospitalized for the weak heart muscular at that time? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp11b_L
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said that you had angina, angina pectoris or chest pain due to heart disease? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp11c_L
variable.description: [General health]. Were you first told that you had angina since we last contacted you on mm/dd/yyyy? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp12_L
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said that you had an irregular heart beat called atrial fibrillation, or atrial fibrillation on a heart scan or electrocardiogram tracing? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp13a_L
variable.description: [General health]. Do you often have swelling in your feet or ankles at the end of the day? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp13b_L
variable.description: [General health]. Is the swelling in your feet or ankles gone in the morning? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp16d_L
variable.description: [General health]. Were you hospitalized for a blood clot in a leg or deep vein thrombosis at that time? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp17b_L
variable.description: [General health]. Were you hospitalized for a blood clot in a your lungs or a pulmonary embolus at that time? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp18b_L
variable.description: [General health]. Were you told by the physician that you had chronic lung disease since we last contacted you on mm/dd/yyyy? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp19a_L
variable.description: [General health]. Are there times when you wake up at night because of difficulty breathing? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp19b_L
variable.description: [General health]. Do you have trouble breathing or shortness of breath when hurrying on the level? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp19c_L
variable.description: [General health]. Do you have trouble breathing or shortness of breath when walking at ordinary place on a level surface? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp19d_L
variable.description: [General health]. Do you stop for breath when walking at your own pace? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp19e_L
variable.description: [General health]. Do you stop for breath after walking 100yards on the level? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp19f_L
variable.description: [General health]. Do you have difficulty breathing when you are not walking or active? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp19g_L
variable.description: [General health]. Do you usual have some cough or wheezing? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp20a_L
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had asthma? Did the doctor say that you have asthma since we last contracted you on mm/dd/yyyy? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp20b_L
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had asthma? Do you have pain in your legs caused by a blockage of the arteries? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp20c_L
variable.description: [General health]. Has a doctor ever said you had asthma? Has a doctor ever said that you have peripheral vascular disease or intermittent claudication? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp25a_L
variable.description: [Admissions]. Were you (was [name]) admitted to an emergency room or a medical facility for outpatient treatment since our last contact on (mm/dd/yyyy)" [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp25b_L
variable.description: [Admissions]. Were you (was [name]) admitted to an emergency room or a medical facility for outpatient treatment since our last contact on (mm/dd/yyyy)? Was this related to a heart problem or difficulty breathing? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUL]

variable.name: AFUcomp10_M
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you has a doctor said that your heart is weak, or does not pump as strongly as it should, or that you had fluid on the lungs? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUM]

variable.name: AFUcomp11a_M
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you on mm/dd/yyyy, has a doctor said that you had a heart attack? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUM]

variable.name: AFUcomp11c_M
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you has a doctor said that you had a angina pectoris or chest pain due to heart disease? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUM]

variable.name: AFUcomp12_M
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you has a doctor said that you had an irregular heart beat called atrial fibrillation, or atrial fibrillation on a heart scan or electrocardiogram tracing? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUM]

variable.name: AFUcomp14_M
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you has a doctor said you had high blood pressure? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUM]

variable.name: AFUcomp15_M
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you has a doctor said you have diabetes or sugar in the blood? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUM]

variable.name: AFUcomp16_M
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you has a doctor said that you had a blood clot in a leg or deep vein thrombosis? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUM]

variable.name: AFUcomp20c_M
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you has a doctor said that you have peripheral vascular disease or intermittent claudication? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUM]

variable.name: AFUcomp21a_M
variable.description: [General health]. Since we last contacted you has a doctor said that you had cancer? [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form, AFUM]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Annual Follow-up Questionnaire Form]

variable.name: AFUcompFU
variable.description: Follow up days to contact since baseline
